EClass.Presentation.LayerObject

Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • EClass.Presentation.LayerObject.LayerObject
      • EClass.Presentation.LayerObject.Triangle

  • public abstract class Triangle
extends LayerObject
    The Triangle is geometric shape for a Layer object. The three edges represent the edges of the triangle.
